mapper.select: WITH NeedSub AS ( SELECT picture, car_name, model_name, price, zero_to_hundred, max_mileage, car_type, km_kwh, power_kw, homepage_url, brand_name, IF(price < 9000, min, 0) AS min, IF(price < 9000, max, 0) AS max, govern_subsidy FROM charger_view, Subsidy WHERE (brand_id = #{brand_first_id} OR brand_id = #{brand_second_id}) AND price BETWEEN #{minprice} AND #{maxprice} AND Subsidy.car_size = charger_view.car_type AND Subsidy.special_do_id = #{special_do_id} AND charger_view.car_type = #{car_type} ) SELECT * FROM NeedSub WHERE price <= calculate(#{subsidy_yn})
